formElement.label: Wsadmin Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of wsadmin, including filename and extension. Optional if the location of wsadmin is in the PATH environment variable. E.g., '/path/to/wsadmin.sh' or 'wsadmin.bat'

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the web application to be updated. i.e: 'webapp'.

formElement.label: Content Type:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to type of content to update.

formElement.label: Operation:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to type of operation to perform as part of update procedure. E.g. Add new content,remove existing content, update existing content

formElement.label: Content:
formElement.documentation: Location of the content to be updated with on file system.Mandatory for add and update operations.

formElement.label: Content URI:
formElement.documentation: The relative path beginning with the installed application archive file to the file to be replaced or added. For example, if the file is located at com/company/greeting.class in module hello.jar, specify hello.jar/com/company/greeting.class for the relative path

formElement.label: Is the application deployed on cluster?:
formElement.documentation: Select this checkbox if the application to be updated is deployed on cluster.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the cluster on which application is deployed.

formElement.label: Server Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the server on which application is deployed.

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are gathered from the given configuration.

formElement.label: Connection Type:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to type of connection to use to connect to the application server that you want to administer. The valid choices are SOAP, RMI, and NONE. Default is SOAP.
